reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous and comfortable, particularly noting it's suitable for warm venues, and appreciate its flattering fit that complements plus-size frames. The color receives positive feedback, with one customer mentioning it's versatile for year-round wear. The material quality and length receive mixed reviews - while some find the fabric nice, others say it feels cheap, and while some like the length, others find it too short. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Prefect Little Black Dress
items.body: I absolutely love this Aoysky Women's V Neck Casual Dress! The material is top-notch—seriously, it feels like a luxury without the luxury price tag. It's so comfortable to wear, and the best part? Not a hint of see-through, which is a total game-changer. It looks exactly like the stock photo, so no surprises there. I’m 5’4”, and the length is spot on. It offers perfect coverage while still making me feel like I could be walking into a brunch or a spontaneous night out (it’s that versatile). The fit is super flattering, and I adore how the flowy skirt and sleeves give it this laid-back, feminine vibe. The stretchy waistband is a dream—comfortable enough to wear all day without feeling like you’ve been cinched into a corset. This dress is truly the MVP of my wardrobe—comfortable, stylish, and versatile enough to dress up or down. I definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a cute, casual dress that doesn't break the bank but still delivers on quality and style! Read more
items.author: Jessica

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great summer dress!
items.body: I love this dress. I wore it to an outdoor anniversary party on a hot and humid day mid-July. This dress was so light and flowy, it kept me comfortable. I love the material, so smooth! It was easy to unwrinkle using my steamer. I ordered this mossy green which was exactly as shown in the pic on Amazon. It covered me well, I with a super cute style to it. I am 5 feet tall and the size xxl went to my knee, I ordered it so big because I wanted it to be loose on my figure. This is why I had to wear a cami under it, to show less cleavage. Had I ordered my size, I am sure I wouldn't have needed it. It was flattering. I recommend this dress 100%. Read more
items.author: heather britt

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous Dress!! Especially for breastfeeding mamas!
items.body: Love this dress!! So comfy and great for those brutal summer months nice and cool and flattering and fits true to size! Also for my breastfeeding mamas this is your dress! Super easy to breastfeed with the lil button on the front! No funky smell and stands up great after multiple washes! This is a must buy for a great price! I’ll be buying more colors! Read more
items.author: Sami

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super Cute!
items.body: This is SO cute. I got so many compliments. I love it so much. Fits great. Super comfy. Easy on and easy off. Love this color too. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Marcy Lynch

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, flattering, and perfect for a last-minute all-white look
items.body: I needed a dress ASAP for an all-white party and this Aoysky casual dress saved the day. It’s cute, flattering, and flowy, and the fabric is breathable—great for anyone who runs hot. It was easy to slip on and looked exactly right for the event without any fuss. Pros Flattering, flowy silhouette Breathable and comfortable for warm venues Easy, throw-on style—great last-minute option True all-white party vibe Cons None for me; just check sizing if you’re between sizes Bottom line: A simple, stylish go-to for all-white events—highly recommend, especially if you need something cute and comfortable in a hurry. Read more
items.author: MAE

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Dress review (4’10 175 lbs)
items.body: I think the dress it’s cute and a good dress but the fabric was very odd it felt like the cheap material from a Halloween costume, and the dress hung weird on my bust with a lot of gaping. This probably could have been fixed with going a size down but the dress was already very fitted to my waist so going down wouldn’t work on that point. I think overall if you need a cute last minute dress this would be a good option but I would find another dress before I got this one again Read more
items.author: Emily banister

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars true to size
items.body: Very pretty dress, Im short (5ft) so I was worried about the dress being too long. It fit right at my knee. Color is as shown on picture. Material seems of good quality. Sleeves are very nice and flowy. Read more
items.author: Ellie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress
items.body: I can’t ever find a dress I love. But this dress is amazing I feel beautiful in it ! It’s so flattering I prob could have even sized down to a medium but the large fits great. I will absolutely buy another in a different color Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Orange Brown, Blue, Hot Pink, Black, Orange, Dark Green, Light Blue, Navy, Wine Red, Pink, White, Beige, Sky Blue-1. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
